class.name: DiscordppActivityAssets
class.description:
Struct which controls what your rich presence looks like in the Discord client. If you don't specify any values, the icon and name of your application will be used as defaults. Image assets can be either the unique identifier for an image you uploaded to your application via the `Rich Presence` page in the Developer portal, or they can be an external image URL. As an example, if I uploaded an asset and name it `goofy-icon`, I could set either image field to the string `goofy-icon`. Alternatively, if my icon was hosted at `http://my-site.com/goofy.jpg`, I could pass that URL into either image field. See https://discord.com/developers/docs/rich-presence/overview#adding-custom-art-assets for more information on using custom art assets, as well as for visual examples of what each field does.
Reference: [url]https://discord.com/developers/docs/social-sdk/classdiscordpp_1_1ActivityAssets.html[/url]

method.name: LargeImage
method.description: The primary image identifier or URL, rendered as a large square icon on a user's rich presence. If specified, must be a string between 1 and 300 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: LargeText
method.description: A tooltip string that is shown when the user hovers over the large image. If specified, must be a string between 2 and 128 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: LargeUrl
method.description: A URL that opens when the user clicks/taps the large image. If specified, must be a string between 1 and 256 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: SetLargeImage
method.description: Setter for ActivityAssets::LargeImage. Where [param LargeImage] is [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: SetLargeText
method.description: Setter for ActivityAssets::LargeText. Where [param LargeText] is [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: SetLargeUrl
method.description: Setter for ActivityAssets::LargeUrl. Where [param LargeUrl] is [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: SetSmallImage
method.description: Setter for ActivityAssets::SmallImage. Where [param SmallImage] is [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: SetSmallText
method.description: Setter for ActivityAssets::SmallText. Where [param SmallText] is [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: SetSmallUrl
method.description: Setter for ActivityAssets::SmallUrl. Where [param SmallUrl] is [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: SmallImage
method.description: The secondary image, rendered as a small circle over the `largeImage`. If specified, must be a string between 1 and 300 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: SmallText
method.description: A tooltip string that is shown when the user hovers over the small image. If specified, must be a string between 2 and 128 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: SmallUrl
method.description: A URL that opens when the user clicks/taps the small image. If specified, must be a string between 1 and 256 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].
